function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of viruses due to human interaction and movement","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing measures for physical distancing, cleaning and sanitization, and infection prevention and control","Technologies":"Computer vision, digital twin systems, depth cameras","People":"Occupants, customers, staff","Owner":"Architects, designers, maintenance staff, epidemiologists"},{"Description":"Lack of awareness and visualization of virus contamination in the built environment","Impact":"Inadequate understanding of virus transmission and contamination patterns","Mitigation":"Utilizing situational visualization techniques and statistical virus risk metrics to enhance awareness","Technologies":"OccSim, digital twin systems, computer vision","People":"Occupants, building occupants, maintenance staff, designers","Owner":"Architects, computational designers, epidemiologists"}]}
